document.full_text: brent crude oil fell below $115 a barrel on monday, heading for its first monthly decline this year, as investors weighed the prospect that europe's debt crisis and a sputtering u.s. economy may slow demand.
document.title: brent oil, below $115, set for worst month in a year
lines_and_colors: brent crude oil fell below $115 a barrel on monday, heading for its first monthly decline this year, as investors weighed the prospect that europe's debt crisis and a sputtering u.s. economy may slow demand.
